## goup-util utm import

Import a VM from a .utm file (UTM 4.6+)

### Synopsis

Import a virtual machine from a .utm file.

This creates a new VM from the exported template.
Requires UTM 4.6 or later.

Examples:
  # Import a VM template
  goup-util utm import ./debian-template.utm

  # Import from absolute path
  goup-util utm import ~/vm-templates/windows-dev.utm

```
goup-util utm import <utm-file> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for import
```

* [goup-util utm](goup-util_utm.md)	 - Control UTM virtual machines
